name: One Heart
description:
Local multiplayer only!

Also requires a JRE to run: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/down...

The goal is to KILL! Striking another player's sword will deflect both your weapons momentarily, strike their body to win. The slashes (hi, mid, low) all have different characteristics, use the best attack for the situation and stand atop a pile of your foes!

We were approached by SK Games and asked to make a full version of this game they could host on their online store. This game is just a teaser! For the full version head to http://backyard.sk/shop/one-heart

They're also selling physical copies, if that's more your jam: http://backyard.sk/shop/one-heart-physical

And sweet T-shirts that all are all UNIQUE (they printed the samurai dudes in different positions on each one, they look rad): http://backyard.sk/shop/one-heart-shirt

If you have any issues hit me up @2HitAdam or adam [at] 2hitstudio [dot] com. Enjoy!

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

  • A to join
  • Left stick to move (up for jump, down for duck, tap down twice to drop down from platform)
  • Right stick to throw slashes. Tilt high to throw a high slash, mid to throw a middle slash and low to throw a low one. The stick must return to center position before you can slash again.
